code: import axios from"axios";import{config}from"../../utils/axiosconfig";import{base_url}from"../../utils/baseUrl";const getCoupons=async()=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"coupon/"),config);return response.data;};const createCoupons=async coupon=>{const response=await axios.post("".concat(base_url,"coupon/"),coupon,config);return response.data;};const updateCoupon=async coupon=>{const response=await axios.put("".concat(base_url,"coupon/").concat(coupon.id),{name:coupon.couponData.name,expiry:coupon.couponData.expiry,discount:coupon.couponData.discount},config);return response.data;};const getCoupon=async id=>{const response=await axios.get("".concat(base_url,"coupon/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};const deleteCoupon=async id=>{const response=await axios.delete("".concat(base_url,"coupon/").concat(id),config);return response.data;};const couponService={getCoupons,createCoupons,deleteCoupon,getCoupon,updateCoupon};export default couponService;
